choose.when: WHERE brd_gb = 'C01' AND (content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.select:
SELECT rnum,B.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum,A.* FROM(SELECT bno,title,b.id,content,b.ref ref,b.ref_step ref_step,b.ref_level ref_level,b.regdate regdate,hit,brd_gb,m.name,m.fileName FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON(b.id = m.id)
ORDER BY ref DESC,ref_step) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) B WHERE rnum >= #{start}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(bno,title,id,content,ref,ref_step,ref_level,regdate,hit,brd_gb) VALUES((select NVL(MAX(bno),0)+1 FROM board),#{title},#{id},#{content},(select NVL(MAX(bno),0)+1 FROM board),1,0,sysdate,0,'C01')
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(bno) FROM board WHERE brd_gb = 'C01'
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno} AND brd_gb = 'C01'
